Mr. BAUMGARTNER. Mr. Speaker, I rise today in strong support of S.  356, the Secure Rural Schools Reauthorization Act of 2025, which will  be considered under suspension of the rules this week. I urge its swift  passage so it can be sent to the President's desk without delay.
